headline: Assessing BXP (BXP) Valuation After Earnings Turnaround And Fresh 2026 Guidance
summary: Earnings turnaround and new guidance put BXP in focus BXP (BXP) is back on investors’ radar after fourth quarter and full year 2025 results showed higher revenue, a shift from loss to profit, and fresh 2026 earnings guidance for the quarter and full year. See our latest analysis for BXP. BXP’s recent earnings turnaround and fresh 2026 guidance arrive after a mixed share price run, with the latest close at US$64.72 and a 90 day share price return decline of 10.56%.
